thread.title: Great Hotel & Staff - Review
thread.title_full: Great Hotel & Staff - Review of Timhotel Paris XVII Bd Berthier, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: rkent8
title: Great Hotel & Staff - Review
text: We stayed here as part of a tour and don't let some of the current exterior, street side photos mislead you....the hotel is still quiet and a good value even though the whole street in front is going through construction. The staff is nice, and everyone we talked to spoke English, so that helped out a lot. The breakfast is well stocked, clean and everything tasted great. Although a little bit away from all the famous monuments, the Metro station is on all 3 sides of the streets, so it's very convenient. All in all, a good place to stay.
